description:
Akari eats very spicy curry bread. Eiyu ends up in the bath with the three of them. Shio studies with Eiyu.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Extra Extra Hot? Finals Done? Bath Scene? Things Will Never Change? Still Won`t Start a Rom-Com
Geki Gekikara de mo Test Owari de mo Ofuro Kai de mo Kaerarenai kara Lovecome ni Naranai
激激辛でもテスト終わりでもお風呂回でも変えられないからラブコメにならない
